signup.title: Create your account
signup.description: Join the community by filling out the details below. All fields are required.

password_reset.request_description: Enter your email or username and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
password_reset.success_message: If an account exists for that identifier, we'll send password reset instructions.

magic_link.request_description: Enter your email and we'll send you a magic link to sign in.
magic_link.success_message: If an account with that email exists, a magic link has been sent.

twofa.title: Two-Factor Authentication
twofa.verify_description: Enter the verification code from your authenticator app or device

totp.title: Authenticator App Setup
totp.intro: Use an authenticator app like Google Authenticator or Authy
totp.scan_instructions: Scan this QR code with your authenticator app
totp.enter_code: Enter the 6-digit code from your app

recovery.title: Recovery Codes
recovery.description: Save these recovery codes in a safe place. Each code can only be used once.
recovery.warning: These codes will only be shown once!

settings.disable_confirm: Are you sure you want to disable 2FA?

home.guest_message: Get started by signing up or logging in to your account.

validation.password_min_length: Password must be at least 8 characters

auth.magic_link_sent: If an account with that email exists, a magic link has been sent
auth.magic_login_success: Successfully logged in via magic link

twofa.setup_initiated: Scan QR code with your authenticator app
twofa.setup_complete: 2FA enabled successfully. Save your recovery codes!
twofa.method_removed_disabled: Two-factor authentication has been disabled because no other verified methods are available
twofa.enter_authenticator_code: Enter your authenticator code to disable 2FA
twofa.recovery_codes_generated: New recovery codes generated. Old codes have been invalidated

errors.file_too_large: File {{filename}} is too large. Maximum size is {{maxSize}}.
errors.email_invalid: Please enter a valid email address
errors.password_too_short: Password must be at least {{minLength}} characters
errors.rate_limit: Too many requests. Please try again in {{retry_after}} seconds.
errors.rate_limit_2fa: Too many 2FA requests. Please try again later.
errors.account_locked_2fa: Account temporarily locked due to too many failed 2FA attempts. Please try again {{retry_after}}.
errors.network_error: Network error. Please check your connection.
errors.server_error: Something went wrong. Please try again later.
errors.unauthorized: You must be logged in to perform this action
errors.forbidden: You don't have permission to perform this action
errors.not_found: The requested resource was not found
errors.validation_failed: Please check the form for errors
errors.magic_link_rate_limit: Too many magic link requests. Please try again later.
errors.email_already_registered: Email already registered. Please log in.
errors.child_already_linked: Child profile already linked to an account
errors.circle_not_found: Circle not found or you are not a member
errors.invalid_keep_type: Valid keep type required. Options: note, media, milestone
errors.invalid_media_type: Media type must be photo or video

oauth.initiate_failed: Failed to initiate OAuth flow. Please try again.
oauth.invalid_state: Invalid or expired OAuth state token
oauth.unverified_account_exists: An unverified account exists with email {{email}}. Please verify your email first. {{help_url}}
oauth.authentication_failed: OAuth authentication failed. Please try again.
oauth.callback_failed: OAuth callback failed. Please try again.
oauth.account_already_linked: This Google account is already linked to another account
oauth.link_failed: Failed to link Google account. Please try again.
oauth.cannot_unlink_without_password: Cannot unlink Google account. You must set a password first. {{help_url}}
oauth.google_cancelled: You cancelled the Google sign-in process
oauth.invalid_callback: Missing required OAuth parameters. Please try again.
oauth.state_mismatch: Security validation failed. Please try signing in again.

twofa.phone_number_required: Phone number required for SMS method
twofa.enable_before_changing_method: Enable 2FA before changing the default method
twofa.totp_not_configured: Authenticator app not configured yet. Set up the authenticator app from the 2FA setup page first
twofa.totp_not_verified: Verify your authenticator app via TOTP setup before choosing it as default
twofa.sms_no_phone: Add a phone number via SMS setup before using SMS as default
twofa.sms_not_verified: Verify your phone number via SMS setup before choosing it as default
twofa.email_not_verified: Verify email via Email setup before choosing it as default
twofa.recovery_codes_required: Recovery codes must be provided. Codes can only be downloaded immediately after generation
twofa.partial_token_invalid: Invalid or expired partial token. Please login again
twofa.must_be_enabled_for_recovery: 2FA must be enabled to generate recovery codes
